text:
When I was younger, about 3 years ago, I participated in the French Handball championship. It was a great experience for me. In fact, we played in a full sports Hall, and the mood was great. The level of the team was good enough to hope for the first place and become champions of Paris. Before this competition, we had cerf precise preparation and schedules to respect in order to obtain this first place. First of all, we had significant physical preparation, then relatively precise meal and sleep schedules to be in shape on the day of the final. All this preparation, on the one hand reassured me, I left surrounded and ready, but on the other hand put pressure on me, since this so heavy preparation meant an important event. The big day arrived, it was the excitement and the apprehension of the world that there was going to be, the apprehension of this long awaited moment. Once the match is over, it's victory. All people of the team was enjoyed and arrived the moment to stand on the podium in front of all the public. It was a impressionnant moment.
 After this experience, the team was more united and we have some memories together. Moreover, this experience allowed me to gain more self-confidence in Handball, but also in my personal life. It's a very good memory, which is still very important for me today.
